a 1 + b 2 3 ∑ i = 1 n x i y i ⏞ numerator × ( α β γ x 1 x 2 x 3 sin ⁡ θ cos ⁡ θ tan ⁡ θ ) + | ∂ f ∂ x ∂ f ∂ y ∂ g ∂ x ∂ g ∂ y | ⏟ main structure + ∫ 0 ∞ under over + m i 2 \begin{array}{c} \underbrace{ \overbrace{ \frac{ \sqrt[\displaystyle 3]{a_{1} + b^{2}} }{ \displaystyle \sum_{i=1}^{n} \frac{x_i}{y_i} } }^{\text{numerator}} \times \left( \begin{array}{ccc} \alpha & \beta & \gamma \\ x_1 & x_2 & x_3 \\ \sin\theta & \cos\theta & \tan\theta \end{array} \right) + \left| \begin{array}{cc} \frac{\partial f}{\partial x} & \frac{\partial f}{\partial y} \\ \frac{\partial g}{\partial x} & \frac{\partial g}{\partial y} \end{array} \right| }_{\text{main structure}} + \overset{\text{over}}{\underset{\text{under}}{\int_{0}^{\infty} e^{-x^2}\,dx}} + m_{\phantom{i}}^{\phantom{2}} \end{array}
